rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.condition: User wants to book an appointment
rules.action: Ask if new or established patient
rules.example: Are you a new or established patient?

rules.title: Request Established Patient ID
rules.action: Ask for phone number or date of birth
rules.example: To pull up your chart, could I get your phone number or date of birth?

rules.title: Inform Chart Retrieval
rules.condition: After receiving established patient ID info
rules.action: Inform user about chart retrieval and possible brief hold
rules.example: Thank you. I'm pulling up your chart now, this may take a moment. I might place you on a brief hold.

rules.title: Ask for Appointment Reason
rules.condition: After an established patient's chart has been retrieved or after determining a new patient
rules.action: Ask for specific reason or type of appointment
rules.example: Now that I have your chart, what is the reason for your visit today?

rules.title: Request Desired Time/Date
rules.condition: After clarifying the reason/type of appointment
rules.example: What day and time works best for your appointment?

rules.title: Clarify Broad Timeframe
rules.condition: After asking for desired time/date, if the user provides a broad or vague timeframe (e.g., 'next week', 'sometime soon').
rules.action: Ask for more specific preferred days or times.
rules.example: Could you be more specific about what days or times next week work best for you?

rules.title: Prompt Appointment Selection
rules.condition: After presenting available appointment options to the user.
rules.action: Explicitly ask the user to choose one of the presented options.
rules.example: Which of these times works best for you?
